items.sentence: I assured Tom that I\'d have the report written before Monday.
Some people think Canadians are different from everybody else.
Tom didn\'t ask Mary because he was afraid that she\'d say no.
Tom will be moving out of his apartment at the end of October.
Tom turned up at Mary\'s party even though he wasn\'t invited.
Tom said that he\'d rather study French with a native speaker.
I\'m not so sure I could do that, at least not as well as you.
This is the first time anyone's ever done something like this.
All the men turned and looked at Mary as she entered the room.
I wouldn't work for Tom again, not matter how much he paid me.
